name: aws-sdk-js-v3-s3-larger-response-streaming-repro
description: Repro for larger-response-streaming probelm in AWS-SDK v3

scripts.delete-bucket: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=__fake__ AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=__fake__ aws --endpoint http://127.0.0.1:4566/ --region eu-central-1 s3 rb s3://test-bucket --force
scripts.create-bucket: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=__fake__ AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=__fake__ aws --endpoint http://127.0.0.1:4566/ --region eu-central-1 s3 mb s3://test-bucket
scripts.fill-bucket: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=__fake__ AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=__fake__ aws --endpoint http://127.0.0.1:4566/ --region eu-central-1 s3 cp data/ s3://test-bucket/ --recursive
scripts.prepare-bucket: npm run delete-bucket; npm run create-bucket && npm run fill-bucket
